message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn! How about a slight adjustment for a better outcome for both of us? This accounts for the time value of money.
Considering inflation, I'll take a bit more, but you still get a good share.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  Let's wrap this up. I'm taking a small hit on my previous offer, time is money!
You're right, time is money, and I'm not getting any younger! Considering the inflation, I'll take a bigger share.
